import React, {useState } from 'react' import imgUrl from "../images/draw1.webp" import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { postDataAPI } from '../utils/database' const Login = () => { const initialState = { email: '', password: "" } const [userData, setUserData] = useState(initialState); const { email, password } = userData; const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleInput = (e) => { const {name, value} = e.target setUserData({...userData, [name]:value}) } const handleBtn = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { const res = await postDataAPI("login", ) } catch (error) { return alert(error.message) } } return (

Sign in

) } export default Login
